meanings.definition: Resembling a crab in appearance or movement.
meanings.sent1: The crablike creature scuttled sideways along the sandy shore.
meanings.sent2: Her crablike walk made her friends giggle at the beach.
meanings.sent3: The crablike dance move was unexpected but entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The crablike robot moved with precision and agility.
meanings.sent5: The crablike motions of the robot were mesmerizing to watch.
